page.title: 01General description of March
page.content: { March}is in a{flat, farming}area,with {few trees}and{rich peaty soil}which helps provide good{arable crops. Our 'block' is in the Northern part,North of the{River Nene.}About 8 square km.is{farmland,}3 square km. is {residential}and the rest is{railway and{factories.}There are very few {shops}because we are North of the town centre. The new{March/Chatteris by-pass} crosses the S.W.and there is also the main{rail link with Peterborough.}The{ {Marshalling Yards}cover a large area. Being a fairly{quiet country town with {reasonably priced houses,}many people buy houses for retirement and for commuting to Peterborough. The{Fenland District Council}has its offices in our area.
